description:
Key'n'Stroke makes it easy for your audience to follow your actions on the screen. 

### Features
* Highlights mouse cursor position: ![Mouse example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Phaiax/Key-n-Stroke/master/Screenshots/mouse.png)
* Visually indicate mouse clicks.
* Display keystrokes in an overlay at the bottom of the screen: ![Keystroke history example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Phaiax/Key-n-Stroke/master/Screenshots/bottom_right.png)
* Displays special keys (e.g. volume up) and shortcuts.
* Customizable icons, colors, font, size, position, text placement and text orientation.
* Icon in notification area.
* Works with high-dpi screens.
* Works with multi-dpi screen setups.

### Note:  
Key'n'Stroke requires Windows 10 to run.
summary: Displays keystrokes in an overlay window and visualize mouse clicks.
author: Daniel Seemer (Phaiax)
